CallListenHost.description: CallListenHost, VoiceServer CallListen interface Listen IP, Capturer will send CallStarted/CallEnded message to CallListen Host:port

callListenPort.description: CallListenPort VoiceServer Listen Port, Capturer will send CallStarted/CallEnded message to CallListen Host:port

callListeningGatewayList.description: callListeningGatewayList skip CTI Lookup and Extension Lookup for IP List

callListeningNoCtiPhoneList.description: callListeningNoCtiPhoneList skip CTI Lookup and Extension Lookup for Extension List

completedCallProcessDeletePeriodInMinute.displayName: Completed Call Process Delete Period In Minutes
completedCallProcessDeletePeriodInMinute.description: Delete Arhchived CallProcess records older than completedCallProcessDeletePeriodInMinutes, the schedule is executed every completedCallProcessDeletePeriodInMinutes/10

ctiServerHost.description: Deprecated, Not used anymore, you can remain default value, Genesys TServer Host

ctiServerPort.description: Deprecated, Not used anymore, you can remain default value, Genesys TServer Port

doNotPassivateDevices.description: if falseDevices from SVR are deleted 1- if device is not present in Genesys Config or in Alcatel Config. 2-

instanceId.description: The name of the instance. Should be unique per installation

instanceType.rule: ${instanceType} == 'SERVER' or ${instanceType} == 'AGENT' or ${instanceType} == 'BATCH' or ${instanceType} == 'ADMIN' or ${instanceType} == 'DASHBOARD' or ${instanceType} == 'RECORDER' or ${instanceType} == 'AGENT' or ${instanceType} == 'ANALYTICS' or ${instanceType} == 'CAPTURER'

isAgentEventContextEnabled.description: If true All CTI Agent events are logged in AgentEventContext Table

isCTICheckEnabled.description: Should be true in case of any CTI integration usage

isCTIRtpCheckEnabled.description: Should be true in case of Genesys Sip Server and Alcatel-Lucent TSAPI, default value: ((config.isCTICheckEnabled || config.isActiveRecordingEnabled) ? "true" : "false")

isCallEventLogEnabled.description: If true All CTI call events are logged in CallEventLog Table

isCallListeningEnabled.description: Enables CallListening, Capturer will send CallStarted/CallEnded message to CallListen Host:port

isMessageEndLineDelimeted.description: Is used to read Capturer message (CallStarted/CallEnded). Reserved to internal usage, do not change

isResourceListeningEnabled.description: Deprecated, WCF interface for resource(media) upload, wcf not used anymore. If voiceAgent uses 'stream' upload config

isRestartProcessManagement.description: Restart All Cache, Archive, Conversation, Compression, Backup, Encryption Processes, on each config changes. You can switch the value if you think onne of those processes is stucked.

isScreenRecordingEnabled.description: Enables Screen recording. ScreenRecord messages will be send with Call events from CTI link specified in mediaAttachmentTarget otherwise the fallowing log will be displayed: 'Screen Recording is skipped because mediaAttachmentTarget is different then callEventContext.provider'

isSynchAgentStateEnabled.description: Agents and devices are added, updated, deleted with CTI data,

managedCapturerClusterId.description: Example: Cluster001, Used in case of Alcatel-Lucent TSAPI, Server distribute RTP Flows round robin to VoiceAgent's capturer with the same ClusterId

managerAlcatelCallConversationRole.description: For VoiceServer the value should ve master, For VoiceBatch the value should be slave. master is writing CTL events to DB

managerAlcatelCallEventRole.description: For VoiceServer the value should ve master, For VoiceBatch the value should be slave. master is writing CTL events to DB

managerGenesysCallConversationRole.description: For VoiceServer the value should ve master, For VoiceBatch the value should be slave. master is writing CTL events to DB

managerGenesysCallEventRole.description: For VoiceServer the value should ve master, For VoiceBatch the value should be slave. master is writing CTL events to DB

maxAllowedCallTimeDifferenceInSeconds.displayName: Max Allowed Call Time Difference In Seconds
maxAllowedCallTimeDifferenceInSeconds.description: Capturer messages CallStarted/CallEnded are real time messages send to VoiceServer. maxAllowedCallTimeDifferenceInSeconds has no effect on message processing, this option affect TimeDiff health metric data

maxAllowedCtiOfflineLookupTimeDeltaInSec.displayName: Max Allowed Cti Offline Lookup Time Delta In Seconds
maxAllowedCtiOfflineLookupTimeDeltaInSec.description: Capturer data is match with in memory CTI data if they are within maxAllowedCtiOfflineLookupTimeDeltaInSeconds seconds, if no match from memory data then try to match from DB

maxCallCountInConversation.description: New Conversation will be created after maxCallCountInConversation call in a conversation

maxConversationDurationInMinutes.description: New Conversation will be created if the conversation maxConversationDurationInMinutes exided

maxExecutionActorCount.description: Deprecated, Not used anymore, you can remain default value

maxExecutionQueueSizePerActor.description: Deprecated, Not used anymore, you can remain default value

maxExecutionThreadCountPerActor.description: Deprecated, Not used anymore, you can remain default value

maxProcessQueueSize.description: Deprecated, Not used anymore, you can remain default value

maxProcessThreadCount.description: Deprecated, Not used anymore, you can remain default value

maxRestCallDurationInMinutes.description: Start call and Stop Call can be send from VoiceServer REST API. When conversatıon is created from REST API, Conversation is automaticly closed by sending EventReleased after maxRestCallDurationInMinutes minutes

mediaAttachmentTarget.description: Recorded media will be attached to the specified conversation. Screen Start Record will be send only with specified provider events

minRemoveExpiredCallPartyContextInHours.description: Remove CallParty Context from local memory cache after minRemoveExpiredCallPartyContextInHours hours.

preferCapturerCallIdForCtiLookup.description: If false CTI lookup is made after IP/Extension lookup, if true CTı lookup is made with Fromid/Toid captured bu capturer

resourceListenBaseUri.description: ResourceListen Base Url. Reserved to internal useage, do not change

restAccessToken.description: REST API Access Token, 'Access-Token' Header should be added in http header

screenRecordingUserDataFilter.description: If the expression is true or empty then start screen recording if expression is false then do not start screen recording with the fallowing log is displayed: 'Screen Start Recording skipped because screenRecordingUserDataFilter is not valid'. Example: userData1.Contains("record-1") OR userData2.Contains("record-2")

voiceAdminBaseUri.description: voice Admin Base Url. Reserved to internal useage, do not change

webServerBaseUri.description: voice Admin Base Url. Reserved to internal useage, do not change

webServerScheme.description: http or https. if https then it try to connect to VoiceAdmin via https
